DOC.brief_title: Stent Versus Conservative Treatment Patients With Deep Venous Obstruction
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Meet criterion PTS Patients May Thurner syndrome additional imaging Life expectancy one year Deep venous thrombosis > 1 year Signed informed consent Previous intervention central vein ( inferior vena cava , iliac vein , common femoral vein ) affect limb Known pregnancy Inability answer Dutch QoL questionnaire limit communication Dutch ( write speak ) Contraindication prolong anticoagulant treatment Recent , < 1 year , deep venous thrombosis pulmonary Embolism Known contrast allergy Known dialysis renal insufficiency need additional preparation injection contrast
